content: Samsung’s Reputation Founders on Rush for Lead in Folding Phones Bloomberg Blocked Unblock Follow Following Apr 23 Samsung Galaxy Fold. Photo: Jeenah Moon/Bloomberg By Sam Kim, Mark Gurman, and Min Jeong Lee When Samsung showed off its folding smartphone in San Francisco, engineers back in South Korea popped bottles of bubbly to celebrate the culmination of eight years of research. Two months and an aborted commercial release later, employees are scrambling to figure out what went wrong.
title_html: Samsung’s Reputation Founders on Rush for Lead in Folding Phones

Samsung’s Reputation Founders on Rush for Lead in Folding Phones

Bloomberg
Apr 23

By Sam Kim, Mark Gurman, and Min Jeong Lee

When Samsung showed off its folding smartphone in San Francisco, engineers back in South Korea popped bottles of bubbly to celebrate the culmination of eight years of research. Two months and an aborted commercial release later, employees are scrambling to figure out what went wrong.

title: Samsung’s Reputation Founders on Rush for Lead in Folding Phones
content_html:
Samsung’s Reputation Founders on Rush for Lead in Folding Phones

Bloomberg
Apr 23

By Sam Kim, Mark Gurman, and Min Jeong Lee

When Samsung showed off its folding smartphone in San Francisco, engineers back in South Korea popped bottles of bubbly to celebrate the culmination of eight years of research. Two months and an aborted commercial release later, employees are scrambling to figure out what went wrong.
